Detailed Description

PRAY Block for Creature History Data. because of PHP being a single-inheritance language, we store the history as a CreatureHistory variable rather than simply extending CreatureHistory as well as CreaturesArchiveBlock.

Definition at line 23 of file GLSTBlock.php.

Definition at line 74 of file GLSTBlock.php.

GLSTBlock::GetPHOTBlockName ( $  event  ) 

Gets the PHOTBlock name corresponding to the event given. Useful for getting a photo event's photo. e.g. if $block is a GLSTBlock, $prayfile a PRAYFile, and $event a CreatureHistoryEvent for an event with a photo, one can use this function thusly: $photblock = $prayfile->GetBlockByName($block->GetPHOTBlockName($event)) $photo = $photblock->GetS16File(); $photo is now an S16File ready for use.

Definition at line 87 of file GLSTBlock.php.

GLSTBlock::GLSTBlock ( $  object,
$  name,
$  content,
$  flags 
)

Creates a new GLSTBlock

Parameters:
$object The PRAYFile this FILEBlock belongs to, or the CreatureHistory object to store. *CANNOT* be null.
$name The name of this file block (also the file's name)
$content The binary data of this file block.
$flags The block's flags. See PrayBlock.
